title: Eggless chewy chocolate chip cookies
ingredients: ['85g (3 oz) caster sugar', '85g (3 oz) light muscovado sugar', '175g (6 oz) margarine', '1 to 2 tablespoons golden syrup', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '250g (9 oz) self-raising flour', '125g (4 1/2 oz) chocolate chips or chopped chocolate']
